attributes.action: To start up single use e-cig/puff bar, recycling bins nationwide
attributes.additional_details: Lithium is a very limited resource and more and more of it is wasted each year and ends up in landfills and in our environment,  where as it could be salvaged and recycled to be used again ,I feel these bins will help a great deal with that
attributes.background: I would like e cigarette bins to be considered nation wide due to the amount of waste and environmental damage this waste causes, at the same time ,to use this to also recycle the lithium used in e cigarette batteries as this is also a big problem

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local waste management are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
